data.title: About blue Entertainment
data.text:
...the best from the world of entertainment and offer first-class entertainment under the Â«Swisscom blue+Â» umbrella brand. blue makes highlights from sport, TV, films and series accessible to everyone â regardless of where you get your Internet or digital television.

We delight our customers around the clock with a lot of Swissness and the most popular international entertainment highlights. We continually surprise and inspire our users with our exclusive content, easy operation and the best quality.

Get to know us and our three values. These connect us, define who we are and how we approach our work.

1982 â Foundation of Teleclub AG

Foundation of Teleclub AG, which has been on the air since 1982 making it one of the oldest pay-TV channels in Europe.

1989 â Foundation of Cinetrade AG

Foundation of CT Cinetrade AG and takeover of Teleclub AG. Cinetrade emerges as a film rights and content trading company for the purchase and use of programme and sports broadcasting rights both vis-Ã -vis providers (B2B) and for end customers (B2C).

2005 to 2017 â participation of Swisscom AG Cinetrade Group and founding of Teleclub Programm AG

Swisscom AG acquired a strategic stake of 25% in CT Cinetrade AG in 2005 and a majority stake of 75% in 2013. In the same year, Teleclub Programm AG is also founded (with a minority holding by CT Cinetrade AG), which is now responsible for the design of programmes and editorial content. 2017 Swisscom AG acquires 100% of CT Cinetrade AG.

2019 â Transfer of the Bluewin editorial team to Teleclub Programm AG

The operation and editing of the news and entertainment platform bluewin.ch is transferred from Swisscom AG to Teleclub Programm AG.
